title: STILL CAN'T LOGIN TO LEAGUE N.A PLEASE HELP!!!!!
body:
I've tried every troubleshoot they offer and I still can't log in to league. It gets stuck at Login Status Logging on... then after a couple minutes I get the connection Error.
This has been going on since early morning yesterday.... Riot pls.

Edit: Day 3 and it's STILL going on... Absolutely no response from Riot, or any acknowledgement that something's wrong. 

Edit: 4 days and still no information whatsoever...

Edit:  5 days still not fixed. Hopefully they're working on it.

Edit: It's not fixed anymore... Worked all day and now its messed up again,

replies.body: Thanks everyone for all the assistance.  We're having someone look at some of our devices in the Chicago area and will let you know if I get a follow up to the issue.  Without giving a hard answer, we believe it was a change made sometime last week with the way that we connect with TWC, but won't be able to confirm till we do some more digging.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotWulalowe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=0040,timestamp=2015-06-28T21:34:24.849+0000)
>
> Thanks everyone for all the assistance.  We're having someone look at some of our devices in the Chicago area and will let you know if I get a follow up to the issue.  Without giving a hard answer, we believe it was a change made sometime last week with the way that we connect with TWC, but won't be able to confirm till we do some more digging.

Do we have any more updates? Will this potentially be fixed today?
Thank you for your assistance, even on a Sunday! We all appreciate knowing we're not all going crazy I think.
Yep its officially been over 48 hours for me too. This is kind of ridiculous. I want to be able to participate in the IP Bonus Weekend...

We think we might have an idea of whats going on but could use a few more tracerts from other people to that 192.64.170.15 address to confirm suspicions, hopefully with location tracing from as well.  If we need to make a change, it could affect a lot of players, so we want to be sure our suspicions are correct.  

Thanks for all the assistance so far and your patience while we work this out.

I've reinstalled and followed all the troubleshooting, still nothing. I have put quite a bit of money into this game and shouldn't have to deal with this. No other moba or any other genre of game for that matter has given me problems the way Riot has. The worst part is that rather than adressing the problem, they seem to throw their hands up in the air and say "it's not us, must be all of you". Users shouldn't have to do the huge amount of work that Riot asks them to, in order to fix a game that they pay for. This is getting to be a regular thing... might be time to switch to HotS or DotA2.
Get this post as high as possible so Riot sees it. I am having the exact same issue. I've sent a ticket, and its been about 20 hours and still no response.

UPDATE: I was able to log-in! I'm not sure about connection to games or anything else, but the log-in was successful after hard work from Riot support and Oak Senpai for creating this thread to get their attention. Thanks everyone who helped!

> [{quoted}](name=Pryzum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=0071,timestamp=2015-06-30T04:17:32.794+0000)
>
> UPDATE: I was able to log-in! I'm not sure about connection to games or anything else, but the log-in was successful after hard work from Riot support and Oak Senpai for creating this thread to get their attention. Thanks everyone who helped!

Nice!!! Unfortunately, I cannot login, do you mind saying where you live?

> [{quoted}](name=LaserDeathTime,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00710000,timestamp=2015-06-30T04:22:30.887+0000)
>
> Nice!!! Unfortunately, I cannot login, do you mind saying where you live?

yup still unable to log in here too. Looks like a couple people that couldn't can though.

> [{quoted}](name=Oak Senpai,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=007100000000,timestamp=2015-06-30T04:38:59.382+0000)
>
> yup still unable to log in here too. Looks like a couple people that couldn't can though.

It seems its the people in every state but Ohio, i.e. Kentucky, Wisconsin, are able to get in. I'm sure Riot is hard at work right now. We may not have hurricanes, droughts, tornadoes, or tsunamis, but it seems we make up for it in shitty internet

The problem is most of the time the techs that you talk to deal with overall internet connectivity issues and wouldn't really be able to help with connecting to a single endpoint.  The reason we were having you guys contact them is to get a string of reports with them for the same issue, so that when our network team reaches out to them to troubleshoot this, we can tell them to look at the submitted requests as a larger issue.

@L go balls deep, I'm not able to see the exact number of submitted tickets for this unfortunately.  Honestly though, if its more then 0 its too many.

Oh its alright man I was just curious. Additional info that might help, two of my friends who live within a 50 mile radius of me both have TWC and havent had any issues to date. So not everyone with TWC in Ohio is having this issue :l One of my theories was possibly the router I have through TWC 

I have a Ubee router with the 
Hardware Version	3.13.1
Software Version	8.14.3105

Could it be possible that a recent software update for this particular router would block the connection? [ idk just grasping at ideas at this moment]

Its wild how this is the only game that ever has issues for me :/ hope all is fixed soon, there's only so much i can trouble shoot, i must have reset my Dns about 50 times... used a different wifi connection, went through all troubleshooting guides 2 times over... Rip bonus IP weekend  and day off :P lulz 

ps: i learned tons new computer stuffs today tehe :D
Riot save us! Show us your love! :P

Same issue here, and obviously I tried everything they suggested and then some. This is absolutely ridiculous to have a company this large have constant connection problems and for them to blame our side of it. Something so clearly widespread and constant is a problem with how their client connects, not us. I've tried close to about 30 solutions and they all did nothing, and on top of that, it takes riot support about a day to respond.
i've tried every thing i can ,but none of these could solve this problem. so, pls riot do something to help us

Has this been resolved for other people from KY/OH as well?  Would love to get feedback from some of you that have been dealing with this for a while.  We made some network changes to the way we handle the traffic coming to us from TWC so hopefully this was the solution.
Cincinnati OH reporting in.  I can log in succesfully. Thanks for all your help! i can run a tracer if you want some data.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Cooner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a90000,timestamp=2015-07-01T22:12:21.716+0000)
>
> Cincinnati OH reporting in.  I can log in succesfully. Thanks for all your help! i can run a tracer if you want some data.

Thanks, I think we got it.  Just wanted to make sure it helped :)
Someone give RiotWulaLowe a raise. Seriously, it's like he never sleeps! Thanks for all your help, and every other person trying to make sure we cn go back to playing.
Isn't it obvious? We've been tearin' up the Rift so much that the game is forcing us to give it a break. I expect an LCS team contract and a personal hand masseuse to compensate.
@sanaru02 could you run that same trace again in another 5 mins or so?
For sure!

hmm yep from the tracert you sent, you are able to reach the login server just fine so it sounds like something might be blocking your login from authenticating.  I apologize that you have had to deal with this for the past few days and that you missed out on the IP rewards, I'll reach out to our network team and see if something is up with the login server.  Hopefully we can get this resolved for all of you that are seeing this issue.

Hello Oak Senpai, reinstalling generally won't fix a connection error. There are a lot of things that exist on your computer and in-between your Internet Service Provider connection and Riot's servers. Have you gone through all the steps in the Connection Troubleshooting Guide? You can find that guide [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). I would highly recommend starting with your Firewall settings, as firewall settings can change abruptly from time to time.
Went through the entire list lol
This is my problem as well. I'd like to play tonight but it isn't looking like a possibility. Tried the things in the video, didn't work. Please, Riot.
it still doesnt work for me
^ i've already tried all that it still doesn't work =/
i can log on and play in EU WEST, but still cant connect in to NA server.
Northern Kentucky area tracer is on this post. Same thing, I was able to play yesterday but it isn't working anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Hikano,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a5,timestamp=2015-07-01T17:06:11.903+0000)
>
> Northern Kentucky area tracer is on this post. Same thing, I was able to play yesterday but it isn't working anymore.

Can you try now and let me know if you can login and what the tracert looks like?

Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=Pryzum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a2,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:33:09.506+0000)
>
> Northern Kentucky, close to Ohio

So the only thing I can see from the working trace i have is at hop 9 it went through 4.15.84.42, from all the bad traces its going through 24.27.236.125.  Hop 24.27.236.125 is owned by TWC, hop 4.15.84.42 is owned by Level 3, you can find this information on  http://cqcounter.com/whois/ if your interested in who owns what.  So it sounds like something with TWC and that specific hop might be an issue.  Will need to talk with the engineers later today when they get into the office.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotWulalowe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a20000,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:40:42.378+0000)
>
> So the only thing I can see from the working trace i have is at hop 9 it went through 4.15.84.42, from all the bad traces its going through 24.27.236.125.  Hop 24.27.236.125 is owned by TWC, hop 4.15.84.42 is owned by Level 3, you can find this information on  http://cqcounter.com/whois/ if your interested in who owns what.  So it sounds like something with TWC and that specific hop might be an issue.  Will need to talk with the engineers later today when they get into the office.

Oh, thanks for noticing that. And thanks for looking into the problem again. When this first happened I sent in a support ticket and got a response from Riot Swizzle. I sent him/her the information he/she requested earlier. Should I say that you are handling this, or keep the issue afloat with both of you guys?

> [{quoted}](name=Pryzum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a200000000,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:48:22.846+0000)
>
> Oh, thanks for noticing that. And thanks for looking into the problem again. When this first happened i sent in a support ticket and got a response from Riot Swizzle. I sent him/her the information he/she requested earlier. Should I say that you are handling this, or keep the issue afloat with both of you guys?

I'm working on this as a more broad problem affecting a lot of players and hopefully when its fixed for one its fixed for all.  The support ticket you opened will be a better way for us to track your individual issue, in case it still happens after all this mess is over :)

Wulalowe, my problem has completely resolved. I was playing games last night and was able to join games and did not have any latency issues. Just updating you. I was one of the people from Texas using broadband.

> [{quoted}](name=Trentoneus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a20000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-01T16:30:38.243+0000)
>
> Wulalowe, my problem has completely resolved. I was playing games last night and was able to join games and did not have any latency issues. Just updating you. I was one of the people from Texas using broadband.

Thanks, yeah that was all related to the Century Link fiber cut, they fixed that last night sometime around 7pm i think.  http://www.9news.com/story/news/local/2015/06/30/coordinated-attack-downs-services-with-cut-lines/29527161/ was a short story about what was happening if your interested.
And that's incomplete, sorry. Let me re-upload the finished tracert

> [{quoted}](name=Pryzum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00a1,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:30:24.943+0000)
>
> And that's incomplete, sorry. Let me re-upload the finished tracert

Thanks, your from the Ohio area as well?
ITTTSSSSS BAAACKKKK D: IF YOU"RE GOING TO TEASE ME RIOT AT LEAST GO ALL THE WAYYY

> [{quoted}](name=l Go BalIs Deep,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=0092,timestamp=2015-07-01T02:01:33.097+0000)
>
> ITTTSSSSS BAAACKKKK D: IF YOU"RE GOING TO TEASE ME RIOT AT LEAST GO ALL THE WAYYY

Can you do a tracert to 192.64.174.1 if you still can't connect so we can compare the path that worked for you vs one that is currently broken?  Or is everyone able to login again in here?

> [{quoted}](name=RiotWulalowe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=00920000,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:07:40.473+0000)
>
> Can you do a tracert to 192.64.174.1 if you still can't connect so we can compare the path that worked for you vs one that is currently broken?  Or is everyone able to login again in here?

The issue is back, and has been since last night. I don't have a tracert from when it worked, but would it help to send you a current one?

> [{quoted}](name=Pryzum,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Gu9X1eEH,comment-id=009200000000,timestamp=2015-07-01T12:18:18.865+0000)
>
> The issue is back, and has been since last night. I don't have a tracert from when it worked, but would it help to send you a current one?

If you have one to that address it would be helpful.  I'm sad that we weren't able to get more working route traces at the time but at least getting bad traces will help us when we reach out to TWC.

The thing is it only mentions players in the SW having issue if you follow the link to the server status. Im East coast (North East to be more specific). It was nice to play a few games, but itd also be nice to at least get some sort of idea of what caused this particular issue in the first place (not the downed line in Portland, but prior to that). 

Its just frustrating when people who live relatively close are still able to play, but some of us cant and we have no idea why.

EDIT: I do wanna give props to Wulalowe for seemingly stalking this thread the last few days and trying to update us/ help us.
i'm back to having the same error as well. It was fine for a couple of games and it just disconnected me. I'm having the same login issue as before.
Welp, it was fixed for a few hours. Now I got DC-ed while in game and had to force quit the app and can't log in again. Sigh.

Leaver buster should have no impact on future promotion eligibility, loss forgiveness is a manual process that can only affect active running games, unfortunately that's the limitation of the process :(   Leaverbuster also should not impact your playing unless you have a habit of disconnecting from games, ones and twos here and there shouldn't affect you.  That being said if you do happen to get flagged, you're more then welcome to send a email to support with a reference to this thread and be sure to tell them that this was due to a fiber cut in NA  and they should be able to help you.  

I realize I used a lot of "should" in those sentences.  The only ones who would know those answers for sure would be the player support team, so please don't take my word as truth and if you really are worried reach out to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new for confirmation.

I'm still at this very moment unable to connect with the above message showing... and unable to reach load screen from champ select. This is a serious problem considering it's not giving us Loss Prevented.

Edit: I've tried everything from restarting league about 10 tomes and restarted my computer 4 times, and even my router about 10 tomes. Nothing has helped. Firewall is off, ip6 is off.... help?
